meanings.definition: The act of submitting something again.
meanings.sent1: After making corrections, the resubmission of her essay was much better.
meanings.sent2: The resubmission of the form was required to complete the application process.
meanings.sent3: His resubmission of the homework made the teacher smile.
meanings.sent4: The resubmission of the proposal breathed new life into the project.
meanings.sent5: The resubmission of the painting showcased the artist's dedication.

meanings.definition: The process of resubmitting a document or application.
meanings.sent1: The resubmission of the report was necessary to meet the deadline.
meanings.sent2: She completed the resubmission of the form with attention to detail.
meanings.sent3: The resubmission of his job application brought a sense of relief.
meanings.sent4: The resubmission of the manuscript was like giving it a second chance.
meanings.sent5: His resubmission of the proposal impressed the committee members.
